sys_ux_client_script.name: Set category and orderType on select
sys_ux_client_script.sys_name: Set category and orderType on select

sys_update_version.name: sys_ux_client_script_bb6dd2724706b110036bbce5536d433d
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Default copy">a76d9a324706b110036bbce5536d4357</macroponent><name>Set category and orderType on select</name><preset/><required_translations>[
    
]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
* @param {params} params
* @param {api} params.api
* @param {any} params.event
* @param {any} params.imports
* @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
*/
function handler({
    api,
    event,
    helpers,
    imports
}) {
    switch (event.elementId) {
        case "new_product_card":
            if (api.state.category == "product" && api.state.orderType == "add") {
                api.setState("category", "");
                api.setState("orderType", "");
            } else {
                api.setState("category", "product");
                api.setState("orderType", "add");
            }
            break;
        case "new_service_card":
            if (api.state.category == "service" && api.state.orderType == "add") {
                api.setState("category", "");
                api.setState("orderType", "");
            } else {
                api.setState("category", "service");
                api.setState("orderType", "add");
            }
            break;
        case "change_product_card":
            if (api.state.category == "product" && api.state.orderType == "change") {
                api.setState("category", "");
                api.setState("orderType", "");
            } else {
                api.setState("category", "product");
                api.setState("orderType", "change");
            }
            break;
        case "change_service_card":
            if (api.state.category == "service" && api.state.orderType == "change") {
                api.setState("category", "");
                api.setState("orderType", "");
            } else {
                api.setState("category", "service");
                api.setState("orderType", "change");
            }
            break;
        case "cancel_product_card":
            if (api.state.category == "product" && api.state.orderType == "disconnect") {
                api.setState("category", "");
                api.setState("orderType", "");
            } else {
                api.setState("category", "product");
                api.setState("orderType", "disconnect");
            }
            break;
        case "disconnect_service_card":
            if (api.state.category == "service" && api.state.orderType == "disconnect") {
                api.setState("category", "");
                api.setState("orderType", "");
            } else {
                api.setState("category", "service");
                api.setState("orderType", "disconnect");
            }
            break;
        case "add_order_service_card":
            if (api.state.category == "service" && api.state.orderType == "add") {
                api.setState("category", "");
                api.setState("orderType", "");
            } else {
                api.setState("category", "service");
                api.setState("orderType", "add");
            }
            break;
        case "change_order_service_card":
            if (api.state.category == "service" && api.state.orderType == "change") {
                api.setState("category", "");
                api.setState("orderType", "");
            } else {
                api.setState("category", "service");
                api.setState("orderType", "change");
            }
            break;
        case "disconnect_order_service_card":
            if (api.state.category == "service" && api.state.orderType == "disconnect") {
                api.setState("category", "");
                api.setState("orderType", "");
            } else {
                api.setState("category", "service");
                api.setState("orderType", "disconnect");
            }
            break;
    }
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-10-26 18:53:14</sys_created_on><sys_id>bb6dd2724706b110036bbce5536d433d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Set category and orderType on select</sys_name><sys_package display_value="AT&amp;T Workspace" source="x_876519_att_work">e90c1d2e47c63110036bbce5536d43e6</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="AT&amp;T Workspace">e90c1d2e47c63110036bbce5536d43e6</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_bb6dd2724706b110036bbce5536d433d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-10-26 18:53:14</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
